name: Relying/Issuing Party Sample
description: A barebones Node.js app for requesting user's public key and issuing basic claims

HOST.description: Change 'someappname' to the app name you chose above

CLIENTID.description: The client id registered on the trusted key devportal

CLIENTSECRET.description: The client secret registered on the trusted key devportal

ISSUER_URL.description: The issuer service url to be used by OAuth and Trusted Key SDK

WALLET_URL.description: The wallet service url to be used by OAuth and Trusted Key SDK
